import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import Navbar from '../components/navbar' import Explore from '../pages/Explore' import gsap from "gsap" const Home = () => { useEffect(() => { gsap.to("#animated-text", { backgroundPosition: "200%", // Moves the gradient across the text duration: 2, // Total time for one wave to pass ease: "power1.inOut", // Smooth ease for the animation repeat: -1, // Repeat infinitely yoyo: true // Reverse the animation back and forth }); }, []); return ( <>

{['R', 'e', 'p', 'r', 'e', 's', 'e', 'n', 't'].map((char, idx) => ( {char} ))}

{['Y', 'o', 'u', 'r', 's', 'e', 'l', 'f'].map((char, idx) => ( {char} ))}

Party Wear
Tops & T-Shirts
Blouses & Shirts
Dresses
Skirts
Jeans & Pants
Leggings & Jeggings
Ethnic Wear
Sweaters & Cardigans
Office Wear
Vacation Outfits
) } export default Home
